title: BRIEF-Absolute Announces Renewal Of Share Buyback Program
text:
BRIEF-Absolute Announces Renewal Of Share Buyback Program

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 27, 2019 18:31)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Absolute Announces Renewal Of Share Buyback Program Sept 27 (Reuters) - Absolute Software Corp : * ABSOLUTE ANNOUNCES RENEWAL OF SHARE BUYBACK PROGRAM * ABSOLUTE SOFTWARE - PROCEEDING WITH RENEWED NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID FOR UP TO 2.7 MILLION OF ITS COMMON SHARES, REPRESENTING ABOUT 10% OF CO'S PUBLIC FLOAT * ABSOLUTE SOFTWARE CORP - HAS RECEIVED APPROVAL FROM TORONTO STOCK EXCHANGE TO COMMENCE BID ON OCTOBER 1, 2019

BRIEF-Absolute Announces Renewal Of Share Buyback Program
description: BRIEF-Absolute Announces Renewal Of Share Buyback Program
